snippet: The police said Thursday that a man had been charged with a drug offense after children visiting his house were given bags of cocaine instead of candy during Halloween trick-or-treating.
lead_paragraph: The police said Thursday that a man had been charged with a drug offense after children visiting his house were given bags of cocaine instead of candy during Halloween trick-or-treating.

headline.seo: Britain: Man Charged With Giving Children Cocaine
headline.main: Britain: Man Charged After Children Get Cocaine Instead of Halloween Candy
headline.print_headline: Britain: Man Charged After Children Get Cocaine Instead of Halloween Candy
